testDependencies.description: A dependency that is required to run tests for your plugin

items.description: A dependency that is required to run tests for your plugin

url.description: The git repo url of your dependency. This option is ignored if the dir option is set

branch.description: The branch name of the git repo. This option is ignored if the url option is not used

dir.description: The directory where your dependency is installed locally. This option would override the url option

testPaths.description: A list of glob patterns for collecting test files
